wwv_flow_api.create_page_process( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(54347480122497201) ,p_process_sequence=>10 ,p_process_point=>'BEFORE_HEADER' ,p_process_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_process_name=>'InsertData' ,p_process_sql_clob=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'BEGIN', ' execute immediate ''TRUNCATE TABLE UXI_ORDERS'';', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (1,1,5120.10,SYSDATE-10,V(''APP_USER''),''Backorder'');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (2,1,248.22,SYSDATE-10,''sonic@oracle.com'','''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (3,1,696.46,SYSDATE-7,''shadow@oracle.com'','''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (4,1,1001.01,SYSDATE-7,V(''APP_USER''),'''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (5,1,8192.11,SYSDATE-3,''blaze@oracle.com'','''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (6,1,2012.96,SYSDATE-3,''sonic@oracle.com'','''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (7,1,655.50,SYSDATE-2,''shadow@oracle.com'',''First Order'');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (8,1,453.10,SYSDATE,V(''APP_USER''),'''');', ' INSERT INTO UXI_ORDERS VALUES (9,1,10220.00,SYSDATE,''sonic@oracle.com'',''VIP'');', 'END;')) ,p_process_clob_language=>'PLSQL' ,p_error_display_location=>'INLINE_IN_NOTIFICATION' ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
